TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IInstanceContextProvider

summary.span: 实现以参与创建或选择 对象，特别是启用共享会话。

span.span: Implement to participate in the creation or choosing of a object, especially to enable shared sessions.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 实现 接口，以向系统提供相应的 对象。Implement the interface to provide the appropriate object to the system. 通常，实现此接口是为了支持共享会话、启用服务实例池、控制服务实例的生存期或将客户端之间的上下文分组。Typically, this interface is implemented to support shared sessions, enable service instance pooling, control lifetimes of service instances, or to group contexts among clients. 例如，若要实现共享，则可插入自定义 ，从而确定要进行关联的来自客户端的会话或调用和 对象。For example, to implement sharing, insert a custom to decide which session or call from a client is associated with which object. 有关演示实例上下文共享的示例，请参阅[InstanceContextSharing](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4a6a46d7-b7d7-4bb5-a0dd-03ffa3cbc230)。For an example that demonstrates the sharing of instance contexts, see [InstanceContextSharing](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4a6a46d7-b7d7-4bb5-a0dd-03ffa3cbc230). > [!NOTE] > 当 插入到 Windows Communication Foundation （WCF）中时，控制 对象创建（属性）的普通属性将不再 处于选中状态，并且不起作用。When an is inserted into Windows Communication Foundation (WCF), the normal property that controls the creation of objects (the property) is no longer checked and has no effect. 还有一种更为常见的机制，即 ，您可以在创建 对象时，利用该机制对其进行初始化（例如，将自定义扩展附加到每个 ）。A more generic mechanism by which you can initialize objects when created (for example, to attach custom extensions to each ) is the .

span.span: The channel that received the message.
Called when a new message is received.

returns.span: 用于处理消息的 对象；返回 ，命令 WCF 创建新的 对象。

span.span: The object that is used to process the message; return to instruct WCF to create a new object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法是在接收消息时调用的。The method is called when a message is received. 返回要用于消息处理的 对象或 `null`。Return the object that you want to process the message, or `null`. 对于 `null` ，WCF 将为消息创建一个新 的对象，然后调用 方法。In the case of `null`, WCF creates a new object for the message and then calls the method. 如果您返回 `null`，则新的 对象将遍历调节系统，并增加 的计数值。If you return `null`, the new object goes through the throttling system and increments the count of .

span.span: The channel that received the message.

summary.span: 当 从 方法返回时调用。

span.span: Called when is returned from the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当 返回 并创建了新的 `null` 对象时，调用 。 is called when returns `null` and a new object is created. 调用此方法是为了通知您创建了新的 。This method is called to notify you that a new has been created.

abstract member IsIdle : System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext -> bool

param.name: instanceContext
param.span: 被视为空闲的 对象。

span.span: The object that is considered idle.

summary.span: 当 活动完成时调用，以使实施者能阻止 的回收。

span.span: Called when all activities have completed to enable implementers to prevent the from being recycled.

returns.span: 如果要关闭 Windows Communication Foundation (WCF)，并回收 对象，且要调整 的值，则为 ；否则，为 。

span.span: if Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) is to close and recycle the object and adjust the value of ; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当 WCF 即将关闭并回收空闲对象时调用， 以便可以通知运行时是否继续执行此操作。 is called when WCF is about to close and recycle an idle object so that you can inform the runtime whether to continue doing so. 有关演示实例上下文共享的示例，请参阅[InstanceContextSharing](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4a6a46d7-b7d7-4bb5-a0dd-03ffa3cbc230)。For an example that demonstrates the sharing of instance contexts, see [InstanceContextSharing](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4a6a46d7-b7d7-4bb5-a0dd-03ffa3cbc230).

MemberSignature.Value: public void NotifyIdle (System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.InstanceContextIdleCallback callback, System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext instanceContext);

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void NotifyIdle(class System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.InstanceContextIdleCallback callback, class System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext instanceContext) cil managed
Public Sub NotifyIdle (callback As InstanceContextIdleCallback, instanceContext As InstanceContext)

abstract member NotifyIdle : System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.InstanceContextIdleCallback * System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext -> unit

param.name: callback
param.span: 通知 WCF 对象的关闭和回收时间的 对象。

span.span: The object that notifies WCF when the object is to be closed and recycled.

summary.span: 当 方法返回 时调用，以使实施者能提供回调，从而通知 WCF 对象的完成时间。

span.span: Called when the method returns to enable implementers to provide a callback to notify WCF when the object is finished.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法返回时，将调用方法，以 `false` 使你能够为 WCF 提供一个 对象，该对象用于通知运行时 已完成其工作。The method is called when the method returns `false` to enable you to provide WCF with a object that you use to inform the runtime that the has finished its work. 当 对象通知运行时 已完成其工作时，WCF 将再次调用 一次。When the object notifies the runtime that the has finished its work, WCF calls once again. 此循环将一直继续，直到 返回 `true`，然后上下文被关闭并回收。This cycle continues until returns `true` and the context is closed and recycled.
